description.value: Kostchtchie takes a turn on his initiative check result and on his initiative check result -10. He has a full set of actions on each of his turns, and his ability to take an immediate action refreshes on each turn.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ weapon

Standard

Attack: Melee 4 (one creature)

+36 vs. AC

Hit: 3d10 + 20 damage, and Kostchtchie slides the target 4 squares and knocks it prone. This attack scores a critical hit on a roll of 18-20.

Recharge 6

Standard

Effect: Kostchtchie makes a maul attack against each enemy within 4 squares of him.

Recharge when this power'szone ends (see below) ✦ cold, zone) Recharge when this power'szone ends (see below

Standard

Attack: Close blast 5 (creatures in the blast)

+34 vs. Reflex

Hit: 4d10 + 20 cold damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).

Miss: Half damage.

The blast creates a zone that lasts until the end of the encounter. Any enemy that starts its turn within the zone is slowed (save ends). As a minor action, Kostchtchie can move the zone 6 squares. Any creature within the zone when Kostchtchie moves it is teleported to a space within the zone's new location after he moves it. If the zone ends for any reason before the end of the encounter, this power recharges.

Effect: The blast creates a zone that lasts until the end of the encounter. Any enemy that starts its turn within the zone is slowed (save ends). As a minor action, Kostchtchie can move the zone 6 squares. Any creature within the zone when Kostchtchie moves it is teleported to a space within the zone's new location after he moves it. If the zone ends for any reason before the end of the encounter, this power recharges.

keyWords: zone) Recharge when this power'szone ends (see below

description.value:
Recharge 5-6

Move

Effect: Kostchtchie jumps 12 squares, clearing up to 8 squares of height.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Triggered

Requirement: Kostchtchie must be bloodied.

Trigger: An enemy ends its turn within 4 squares of Kostchtchie.

Effect (Free Action): Kostchtchie makes a maul attack against the triggering enemy.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Triggered

Trigger: Kostchtchie is hit by an attack.

Effect (Immediate Reaction): Kostchtchie makes a maul attack against the triggering attacker.

3/Encounter

Triggered

Trigger: Kostchtchie takes acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage.

Effect (Free Action): Kostchtchie gains resist 30 to the triggering damage type until the end of the encounter or until he uses variable resistance again.

Triggered

Trigger: Kostchtchie scores a critical hit.

Effect (No Action): Kostchtchie regains 1 action point he has already used in this encounter.

AC 43Fort 43Ref 43Will 43

Cha 27 (+23)
Languages Common, Abyssal, Giant
Alignment Chaotic Evil
Skills Athletics +37, Intimidate +28Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 27 | Insight 27
